sentence: Why couldnt moses believe his mother sent him away in a basket? because he was in de-nile
explanation: The word de-nile sounds like denial, which means refusing to accept a reality, yet it refers literally to the Nile River in the context of the joke.
first_new_sentence: Moses was found in a basket among the reeds by the Nile River.
second_new_sentence: He was in denial about the truth of his origins and the situation he was placed in.
